UserStory.heading: Tutorial
UserStory.Description: As a player, I want this game to include a tutorial level to help me become familiar with the game.
UserStory.INVEST: I - No，It depends on the action feature. N - Yes. The story is a placeholder for a conversation. Confirmation of specific details can be negotiated. V - Yes. The players will have a better understanding and experience of the game E - Yes. It can be estimated how long it will take since it is a small feature. S - Yes. It is small feature so it can therefore completed in one iteration or Sprint. T - Yes. It can be tested and verified by playing the game.

Tests.Test: Run the game and check whether the game starts with a tutorial or not.
Check whether the player can successfully pass the game tutorial.

UserStory.Label: Should Have
